Title: Creates a universal stock fund which provides residents the ability to invest in New York state
Summary: Creates a universal stock fund which provides residents the ability to invest in New York state upon turning eighteen years old or moving into the state.
LawCode: Add Art 45-C ยง959, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating a universal basic stock fund for residents in the state of New York
